Package com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui

The package contains a small GUI editor allows to edit prol scripts and start them.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EditorPane.EventReplacer  
 

Class Summary
AbstractProlEditor The class extends a Scroll pane and is used as the ancestor for all text windows in the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
AbstractProlEditor.PropertyLink  
DialogEditor The class implements the Dialog editor for the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
EditorPane The class implements the Editor pane for the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
FixedQueue An auxiliary class to make fixed length queue
FontChooserDialog The class implements a small dialog windows to give possibility to custom font because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
HelpDialog The class implements the dialog window contains the help about the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
KnowledgeBaseSnapshotViewDialog The class implements the dialog window which allows user to take a look at the snapshot of the current knowledge base state because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
LibraryInfoDialog The class implements the dialog window shows the help information about prol libraries because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
main The main class which starts the IDE
MainFrame The class implements the main frame of the Prol Pad IDE (a small UI utility to edit and run prol scripts) because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
MessageEditor The class implements the message pane for the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
OptionsDialog The class implements a small dialog window contains the tree which allows user to change values of different IDE parts because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
SourceEditor The class implements the source editor pane of the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
TraceDialog The class implements the trace pane for the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely
 

Package com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui Description

The package contains a small GUI editor allows to edit prol scripts and start them.
